name: Oh no! Santa forgot Christmas!
description:
Santa slept through Christmas Eve! Help him and the kids get cozy in this short voiced-over Rail Shooter.

A few notes:
THE GAME MIGHT FREEZE FOR SOME SECONDS after the introduction dialogue. It's computing some shader stuff for the terrain. Please wait.

Also please play till the end to stay all night and get cozy.

 (Sorry for the jankiness of the rotation of the sleigh, it's on a PathFollow and the automatic rotation sucks. I did not have time to implement my own solution)

Controls

Move the mouse to aim, left click to shoot your Big Fucking Present Gun*.
The kids will throw snowballs at you till you shower them with presents. Getting hit diminishes the cozy meter. Kids will bring up the meter when they arrive back home with gifts in their hands!



*The BFG is a famous weapon of the Doom games. 

Credits:
- the terrain is based on a modification of https://github.com/DeleteSystem32/gd-snow-shader

- Everything else was made by me during the jam. I have learned 3d modeling and animating during this jam please be gentle :'(
